attributes.action: We the people have no faith in the present coalition
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people, have no faith in the present coalition government.
This coalition delivers promises that it does not keep.
We, the people, have no say in the running of the country.
We are not offered referendums as promised, because they never have the questions we wanted.
We want politicians we can trust.
Why is this not possible?
